description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age provided by author in data file
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study - chimpanzee/ orangutan
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
whether participants were able to solve the task when seeing the reward at the bottom- dry (not water in the tube) / wet (quarter filled tube with water) / wet2 ( half filled tube with water)
whether or not participants spat into the tube
medians (mdn) and ranges for spitting latencies and tube-directed actions
how often participants spat water into the tube during the first 2 minutes of each condition
whether or not the participants were successful
mean latency to the first spit and until they obtained the reward in the dry control
